channel.title: Skiller-Pkz 718 - || Unique Home! || Come Join Us! || 24/7 || Stable || Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome to Skiller-Pkz 718!
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4542497/logo.jpg[/img]
Where Legends Are Born!
[b][i][size=18pt]Website![/size][/i][/b] [url=http://skiller-pkz.cu.cc/forum]skiller-pkz.cu.cc/forum[/url]
[b][size=14pt]Webclient[/size][/b] [url=http://skiller-pkz.cu.cc/play.html]skiller-pkz.cu.cc/play.html[/url] [size=18pt]Download Client (Recommended)[/size] [url=http://skiller-pkz.cu.cc/SkillerPkz.jar]skiller-pkz.cu.cc/SkillerPkz.jar[/url]
[font=impact][b][i]Features[/i][/b][/font]
Vote4Cash System!
Donation System!
WE GOT VPS! Stable and No lag
- Lobby (fixed) - Working Lobby Login. - Custom Dungeoneering has been added. - Spirit Three has been added. - Custom Yell has been added. - Runespan has been added. - Sawmill Area (My own way). - Fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Places) (Trefarm, flower, herb etc etc) - Added a better donator zone with NPC - Fixed Shops. - Fixed Prices. - Squeal of fortune with rarities. - Fixed the crashing/dc issues. - All special attacks. - Obtainable Capes. - PvP Points + Shop - PvM Points + Shop - Flawless Pking! - AutoCasting - Lost of Donator Benefits. - Custom Yell Tags. - Set Your Own Yell Color. - Recipe For Disaster + With rewards. - Minigames - All Spellbooks. - Regular updates! - Multi Barrages - Working Summoning - Flawless Pking & Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Ancients. - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects). - Staff of light Special - RuneSpan. - XP Counter. - View Stats (Right Click Option). - Stable Xp Rate. - Automatic Server Messages. - Bank Tabs. - ItemBonuses on All items! - Fight Pits. - Godwars Working - Experience Lamps. - Dominion Items! - Glacors. - Warrior Guilds. - Barrows full Working - Most Correct Item Bonuses. - Lodestone. - Summoning. - Full Fight Caves. - Full Kiln. - Money Pouch - Starter Kit. - Repair Stand. - You can now cut every tree. - Agility. - New home Teleport Animation. - Comp Cape Requirements. - King Black Dragon. - Firemaking with correct anims. - Birds nest. - All Logs can now be fletched - Everything that is 'raw' can now be cooked. - Fixed Bones On Altar + Burying. - Abyss. - Smithing - Living Rock Caverns. - It does has a Custom Spirit Tree & The Real One.(Just enable the real one). - Dice Bag ( Only in Friends Chat ). - You can now bury every Bones. - Flower Games (Pant & Pickup) - Slayer. + Reward Shop. - You will now get damage from the stalls.
More bosses has been added:
Glacors. Jadinko Lair. Ganodermic. Strykewyrms. Dagonnoth's. Armoured Zombies (Training Area). And more..
[B][I][Skills & Information][/I][/B]
Soulwars (Zeal Points/Shop, All working avatars and games) Obelisks (In the wilderness obelisks will automatically teleport you around in the wilderness EXACTLY like RuneScape!) Bank Pins (Secure your banks with Bank Pins which will secure your Banks, Money Pouches and from Trading/Dropping Items!) Grand Exchange (The Grand Exchange is a Secure way to Trade within RuneScape and works great in this server even whilst your offline you can be banking profits!) Secure Money Lottery System Glacors (These work great! Just like RuneScape actually! They will split into minions giving users a great fun way of 'bossing') Duel Arena (Duel your friends/enemys and make money by gambling your items for the duel!) Dungeoneering System (Unlike other RSPS' we have a great way of training your Dungeoneering Level, making it difficult and rewarding in a wave system!) All Skills Trainable (That's right! Every skill is trainable in a fun and awesome way!)
Dungeoneering! We have a different Dungeoneering. There are currently 3 rooms. And each room has their own Npc. You can call them customs. They will give you Dungeoneering Tokens + Dungeoneering xp.
We have many bosses that works, such as; Queen Black Dragon, Kalphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corp Beast, Bork, Tormented Demons and many more!
We have almost all slayer dungeons, and we also have dungeons such as; Godwars, Daggannoth Dungeon, Polypore Dungeon, Glacors Dungeon, Grotworms, Revenants, Jadinko and many more!.
We also do have moneypouch, at entrinthy where players can save their money!
RuneSpan works very well, it has some different options.
Slayer.. Summoning.. Alching.. Squeal Of Fortune.. BonesOnAltar Flawless Pking! Pvm.. & Much More
[SIZE=3][B]Pictures![/B][/SIZE]
Home [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2wfl92o.png[/img]
Teleports! [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4542487/Teleports.png[/img]
Diceing! [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4542488/Dice.png[/img]
100% Working Grand Exchange [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4542490/GE.png[/img]
Skills! [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4542491/Skills.png[/img]
[B][I][SIZE=5]What are you waiting for? Join now![/SIZE][/I][/B] [url=http://skiller-pkz.cu.cc/play.html]skiller-pkz.cu.cc/play.html [/url] [url=http://skiller-pkz.cu.cc/SkillerPkz.jar]skiller-pkz.cu.cc/SkillerPkz.jar[/url] [/CENTER]

@matteskill wrote:

[CENTER]Welcome to Skiller-Pkz 718!

Where Legends Are Born!

[size=18pt]Website![/size]

[size=14pt]Webclient[/size]

[font=impact]Features[/font]

Vote4Cash System!

Donation System!

WE GOT VPS! Stable and No lag

  • Lobby (fixed)
  • Working Lobby Login.
  • Custom Dungeoneering has been added.
  • Spirit Three has been added.
  • Custom Yell has been added.
  • Runespan has been added.
  • Sawmill Area (My own way).
  • Fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Places) (Trefarm, flower, herb etc etc)
  • Added a better donator zone with NPC
  • Fixed Shops.
  • Fixed Prices.
  • Squeal of fortune with rarities.
  • Fixed the crashing/dc issues.
  • All special attacks.
  • Obtainable Capes.
  • PvP Points + Shop
  • PvM Points + Shop
  • Flawless Pking!
  • AutoCasting
  • Lost of Donator Benefits.
  • Custom Yell Tags.
  • Set Your Own Yell Color.
  • Recipe For Disaster + With rewards.
  • Minigames
  • All Spellbooks.
  • Regular updates!
  • Multi Barrages
  • Working Summoning
  • Flawless Pking & Combat
  • Working Korasi’s Sword
  • Ancients.
  • Working weapon specs and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects).
  • Staff of light Special
  • RuneSpan.
  • XP Counter.
  • View Stats (Right Click Option).
  • Stable Xp Rate.
  • Automatic Server Messages.
  • Bank Tabs.
  • ItemBonuses on All items!
  • Fight Pits.
  • Godwars Working
  • Experience Lamps.
  • Dominion Items!
  • Glacors.
  • Warrior Guilds.
  • Barrows full Working
  • Most Correct Item Bonuses.
  • Lodestone.
  • Summoning.
  • Full Fight Caves.
  • Full Kiln.
  • Money Pouch
  • Starter Kit.
  • Repair Stand.
  • You can now cut every tree.
  • Agility.
  • New home Teleport Animation.
  • Comp Cape Requirements.
  • King Black Dragon.
  • Firemaking with correct anims.
  • Birds nest.
  • All Logs can now be fletched
  • Everything that is ‘raw’ can now be cooked.
  • Fixed Bones On Altar + Burying.
  • Abyss.
  • Smithing
  • Living Rock Caverns.
  • It does has a Custom Spirit Tree & The Real One.(Just enable the real one).
  • Dice Bag ( Only in Friends Chat ).
  • You can now bury every Bones.
  • Flower Games (Pant & Pickup)
  • Slayer. + Reward Shop.
  • You will now get damage from the stalls.

More bosses has been added:

Glacors.
Jadinko Lair.
Ganodermic.
Strykewyrms.
Dagonnoth’s.
Armoured Zombies (Training Area).
And more…

[B][I][Skills & Information][/I][/B]

Soulwars (Zeal Points/Shop, All working avatars and games)
Obelisks (In the wilderness obelisks will automatically teleport you around in the wilderness EXACTLY like RuneScape!)
Bank Pins (Secure your banks with Bank Pins which will secure your Banks, Money Pouches and from Trading/Dropping Items!)
Grand Exchange (The Grand Exchange is a Secure way to Trade within RuneScape and works great in this server even whilst your offline you can be banking profits!)
Secure Money
Lottery System
Glacors (These work great! Just like RuneScape actually! They will split into minions giving users a great fun way of ‘bossing’)
Duel Arena (Duel your friends/enemys and make money by gambling your items for the duel!)
Dungeoneering System (Unlike other RSPS’ we have a great way of training your Dungeoneering Level, making it difficult and rewarding in a wave system!)
All Skills Trainable (That’s right! Every skill is trainable in a fun and awesome way!)

Dungeoneering!
We have a different Dungeoneering.
There are currently 3 rooms.
And each room has their own Npc.
You can call them customs.
They will give you Dungeoneering Tokens + Dungeoneering xp.

We have many bosses that works, such as; Queen Black Dragon,
Kalphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corp Beast, Bork,
Tormented Demons and many more!

We have almost all slayer dungeons,
and we also have dungeons such as; Godwars, Daggannoth Dungeon,
Polypore Dungeon, Glacors Dungeon, Grotworms,
Revenants, Jadinko and many more!.

We also do have moneypouch,
at entrinthy where players can save their money!

RuneSpan works very well,
it has some different options.

Slayer…
Summoning…
Alching…
Squeal Of Fortune…
BonesOnAltar
Flawless Pking!
Pvm…
& Much More
